ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Riding a wave today, too?
ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_02_10:
Anything can be training! So what should we
do today?
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_01_10:
Makuhita’s power is amazing! He trains all the
time without me having to say anything!
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_02_10: Although, long ago, we had an argument...
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_03_10: Hahaha! I suddenly got sent flying.
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_04_10:
His body may be small, but it’s packed full
of power and he’s got a lot of guts.
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_01_10:
With a tenacious Pokémon like that around, I
soon formed a rivalry.
ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_02_10:
It’d be great if you can find a partner like
that, too!
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_01_10:
I love to go surfing! I’ve trained my body so I
can enjoy riding the rough waves!
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_02_10:
Planking is good for paddling!
Push-ups are good for improving your takeoff!
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_03_10: Squats and marathon running are effective, too!
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_04_10:
Even if you can’t ride the waves, don’t give up.
Training your body requires heart!
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_01_10: When I say heart, I don’t mean the organ.
ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_02_10:
I mean that passion in your heart. That feeling
of being honest with yourself.
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_01_10: I’m from Dewford Town. It’s a small island.
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_02_10:
The island’s pretty small, so we’re all like
family there. We’re all bound by some incredibly
strong bonds.
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_03_10:
We all help each other out. We can stand
against even the strongest of waves.
’Cause we’ve got teamwork!
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_01_10:
When there’s a problem in Dewford Town,
people from all over the island come to help!
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_02_10:
Whether Dewford Town’s strength lives on 
depends on you! 
Ride that wave as best you can!
ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_03_10:
If you ride that wave...
the rest will work itself out somehow!
ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_01_10:
Hitmontop is a Pokémon with a really unique
kind of fighting pose!
ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_02_10:
I use the feeling of the balance of that
excellent pose as reference for surfing.
ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_03_10:
I can tell just by looking at you, you’d be
captivated by its pose, too!
ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_01_10:
There’s a lot of things you can learn from
studying Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_02_10: Who we are today is thanks to Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! We meet again!
Call me when you can’t ride those sweet waves!
ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_02_10:
A long time ago, I used to relax with my training
partners a lot!
ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_03_10:
The best break from working out is more of it!
And a Pokémon battle is the best thing for that!
ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_01_10:
A long time ago, I used to train together with
one that had a love for Rage Candy Bars and
a fiery passion!
ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m waiting for the day when we can
communicate with our hearts!
ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, it’s you! I found something pretty good!
ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_02_10:
I found this under a rock I was pushing
for training!
ch0043_00_toki/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s something great, right? 
Don’t be shy. Use it however you want!
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_01_10:
Look! Look at these biceps! These pecs!
These traps!
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_02_10:
Muscles are obedient!
If you train them, they will answer you!
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_03_10:
Put love into it, just like with raising Pokémon!
That’s the secret to muscle training!
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_01_10:
Waves will take anything you throw at them!
Muscles are the same!
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_02_10:
We say “mother ocean,” so are our muscles 
like a mother, too?
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_03_10:
Nah, wait. We’re the ones raising them, so
we’re the mothers? Or maybe fathers?
ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_04_10:
Hm? That’s not the point? 
Hah, I say weird stuff sometimes!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_01_10:
The trick to getting better at surfing...
is to have a stout heart!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_02_10:
Pokémon battles are the same! Even if your real
ability isn’t enough, don’t lose in your heart!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_03_10:
Don’t just train your body—train your heart!
That’s what it means to be truly strong!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_04_10:
As long as you remember that, you can ride any
wave, no matter how rough!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_01_10:
I love high waves and the salty breeze from the
bottom of my heart!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_02_10:
When the sun’s summer rays are beating down,
I put my training to the test!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_03_10:
And when I finally ride that wave, I’m filled
with an overflowing sense of accomplishment!
ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_04_10:
I want to share that feeling!
Don’t you want to try out surfing?
ch0043_00_toki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You’ll wake up in no time
when you start moving your body!
ch0043_00_toki/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey! Wanna join me for a jog?
The morning breeze is cool and refreshing!
ch0043_00_toki/3003_0701_01_10:
Chilling on the beach in the afternoon, waiting
for good waves... That can be fun, too!
ch0043_00_toki/3004_0701_01_10:
Weather’s nice and the sea is calm.
It’s a perfect afternoon for some training!
ch0043_00_toki/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s so nice listening to the sea at night
and hearing the tide roll in.
ch0043_00_toki/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s nice to cool off a bit at night.
Make sure you’re ready to hit the surf tomorrow!
